website_summaries.verdict: A durable, easy-to-clean shaving soap bowl that will fit in with any style.
pros: Stainless steel is durable and easy to clean
Deep enough to produce a good lather without making a mess
cons: Some have complained of difficulty getting the lid off the bowl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: So, I was at first very excited to receive this item. After the immense struggle to actually open it I was extremely disappointed to see that the entire item was covered in scuff marks. Definitely not worth the money if they're coming like this. It's very light and thin as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Basile

customer_reviews.title: EZXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING Cheap and deceiving picture/description
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bowl is very cheap and the walls are not nearly as thick as the picture would lead you to believe. The bowl is very light and the walls thin, even the shape of the one I received is slightly different than the one pictured. To top it all off, the lid won't even stay closed, it keeps lifting up. This may have been designed in Europe but it was most likely made in China. I'll give it a couple of shaves but this is almost certainly going back.
customer_reviews.author: Flybrew

customer_reviews.title: This is junk. 5 star reviews are fake....
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of total junk... Light weight and cheap as can be. How hard is it to make a lid that fits Amazon must do something about all these fake reviews Also please note that the manufacturer makes no attempt at all to address any of the negative reviews. There is nothing to defend with this junk Returning this junk right away....
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Firth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shaving Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shaving bowl. I have no problems with the lid fitting properly like some of the other reviews mention. Maybe this was addressed with newer versions? The fit and finish is pretty good, not flawless. I have some very light vertical wrinkles around the bowl, likely formed from shaping the bowl during production. Overall, a nice fairly priced shaving bowl. I would buy it again if given a choice.
customer_reviews.author: Worldwide137

customer_reviews.title: HUSBAND DIDN'T LIKE IT BUT I DID!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shaving bowl for my husband and somehow he didn't use it. When I started using Invisalighn retainers I remembered I had this and started using it for my retainers cleaning bath. It's fantastic, easy to clean, with a cute shape and a nice cover that keeps everything out of sight. When I travel I take it on my suitcase filled up with Polident tablets (a great way for keeping the tablets whole). Long story short, now I own 3 of them, one in each house I have.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Luiza WelchTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Quite the conversation piece!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone oohed and aahed and was amazed with it and wanted to know where I got it - guessing Sur La Table, Williams Sonoma... BLEW their minds as I passed the BUTTER DISH at my table!!! Hey, it is stainless steel much like other servers on the table! (I know, I watch too much "Good Eats" and often take Alton Brown's multitasking implements in the kitchen to the next level - and beyond! Got my citrus zester at Ace Hardware (a stainless steel rasp - half the price of the same thing at the above mentioned stores and their like) exactly as he did!)
customer_reviews.author: WSSiegelaar (Knight)

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more impressed with the quality of this bowl. The lid fits perfectly, not too tight or too loose, just right. The other reviews that complained about the lid must be the odd exception. The bowl also matches my new shaving stand and my new shaving brush. A little tip that I picked up for making the soap fit the bowl properly, all you need to do is heat up the soap about 15 to 20 seconds in the microwave in a glass measuring cup and pour it in to the bowl. Once it solidifies again it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover does not fit the bowl
customer_reviews.text: The cover does not fit the bowl. Very shoddy workmanship. The bottom of the bowl says "New York". I don't know what that means. Maybe it the distributor?? Maybe they just thought it would look good. It says Schone, but don't assume it's made anywhere near Germany. I think a German company would fire whoever designed the machining for this. My guess, is as you probably can guess, is that it's made in some prison in China. Unfortunately, it's too late to send it back
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Did not last one month
customer_reviews.text: Failed in less than a month. I really like this shaving bowl. It has worked well - until last week. I was preparing to shave and noticed that it had a small split beginning down the side of the bowl. The stainless steel seam is separating. I have been using this Schöne bowl since November 16th, and today is December 11. Very sad that it didn’t last. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: A nice stainless steel addition to your setup!
customer_reviews.text: Its big, and looks nice. Lid is snug, but not too tight. The quality is to notch! Bottom of bowl holds a 4oz bar just perfectly, with a wide mouth to get your brush in it. Haven't melted a bar in it yet, so I can't review how well it'll hold a melted puck right now. I'm in the desert and don't need to contaminate something that isn't exactly air tight like my metal pomade tin with a screw on lid that I repurposed to hold a slice of soap. Bottom of bowl is laser engraved, and very high quality. Very pleased and will serve my needs for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowl.  Good shape.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably nice shaving bowl. Chrome is shiny and unscratched on arrival, and the lid fits tightly and well. The shape keeps your shaving foam from getting out of the bowl (mostly), and is large enough that you can use pretty much any shaving soap in it. The only issue keeping it from five stars is that the metal is not quite as thick as I'd like, so it lacks a little heft and will slide around while you're whipping up a good lather. If you hold it (as I do) this problem goes away. It's not so thin it deforms in my hand during use, but I've no doubt it would pick up nasty dents though if it were dropped.
customer_reviews.author: D. Settles

customer_reviews.title: A Bowl That Delivers
customer_reviews.text: Even though I purchased this item over a month ago, I was not able to use until last night. We renovated the Master Bath and I wanted to wait until I was able to use the bowl in our new shower. And the wait did not disappoint! The bowl has a fine cut and can hold lather "pucks" of various sizes. I kept my original boar's hair brush and together, I raised excellent shaving foam and enjoyed a great shave in the shower. It cleans up very quickly and cleanly. I highly recommend it to other straight-edge shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shaving Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, durable, won't shatter if dropped ... Using WSPs "Stubby" Extra Dense High Mountain White Shaving Brush with WSP's Unscented for Sensitive Skin Rustic Shaving Soap Vegan (Au Naturel) and a Gillette 5 Fusion Razor I can write that for the first time in my life I find myself wanting to shave. Shaving has become something I enjoy as opposed to being a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, looking really nice, and overall a satisfying experience.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I have been using them for quite a while, and they are still looking beautiful and clean. In fact, they do not keep water stain or foam stain. They are shiny and well-made. I do not see any impurities or deformation on any side. I like people who are doing their job best, and I think this product is from people who are doing a good job and deserve the money paid. As far as I can tell, this can go for years without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap holder.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shave soap holder. It looks great on my black granite bathroom counter. I also love that it has a top, to cover the soap when not in use. It gives my shave set a nice clean fashionable look in my bathroom. It is well made with thick stainless steel, and has the clean look and substantialness I was looking for. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving bowl and storage container
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this because of prior reviews about the lid not fitting well. Some complained of it fitting too tighlly, some say too loose. I found it to be just fine -it's tight enough that the lid won't fall off if you drop the bowl... I drilled a very small vent hole in the lid to let the soap breathe, otherwise, it never dries and becomes a gooey mess. I also find it necessary to leave the lid off for a while to let things dry out. Works well for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Classy and old fashioned. Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bowl. The lid is airtight on it and a perfect fit (when it got here I spent about a half hour popping the lid off and on feeling the suction and listening to the *clink* it makes when it's all the way on... fun times). You can polish it. It's not a really heavy bowl but I liked how light it was. Doesn't look or feel cheaply made. Classy, reminds me of a 1950s barber shop or something. My boyfriend uses it to put his soap in when he wet shaves. He loves the way it looks & feels also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaving bowl
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shaving bowl. I agree with other reviewers that the extra large size allows a better buildup of shaving lather/foam. For years I have shaved with safety razors and shaving brushes. The shaving bowl is a much more refined way of applying the lather and adds to the experience. The lid/cover is a nice touch but I usually just rise the bowl after each use and flip it over to dry. Definitely go for this shaving bowl!
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. Large such that I can easily use ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Large such that I can easily use during shaving. Warms quickly, retains heat decently well (though not as well as ceramic bowls but I very much prefer the stainless steel aesthetics). Great size, good weight. Product arrived quickly, in good shape. One small superficial scratch on the bottom of the bowl on arrival is the only issue keeping from a 5 star rating. Otherwise, very much recommend this product if one is looking for a quality shaving bowl.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: Used once before it began to rust like the shave soap ate through the coating. Thanks to amazons easy return policy I am not stuck with a shabby product and a waste of money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RoboDevil

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than it is and does the job.  Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good value and looks nice. I bought it to offset the cost of a much more expensive razor, badger brush, and stand. It matched perfectly and looks just as nice as the others. It has helped up for a few months so far with no rust or wear. It is lighter weight when you pick it up but I actually like that. Very pleased with the look and value of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Struck out twice despite high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I tried ordering this twice and returned twice upon receipt. The first arrived with a fairly deep scratch along top of lid. The second arrived with a lighter scratch on lid (exact same direction, it appears it's etched into lid at assembly) except in worse condition than first order in that bowl sides had vertical stripes etched in which couldn't be wiped or cleaned off. It's very light and cheaply made, would be willing to pay for something more substantial and with better attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Earl E. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Why did it crack.
customer_reviews.text: This steel bowl cracked for no apparent reason. I have never taking it anywhere and have never dropped it. I like the look of this shaving bowl. But it’s a very disappointing that it crack.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This little bowl is amazing! Well made, beautiful finish, just all around fantastic especially for the money. I don’t know why everyone else is having trouble with the lid being stuck lol, it came off perfectly and haven’t had any issues whatsoever with it, beautiful edition to my shaving collection and bathroom! Items in picture: Edwin Jagger Double Edge Safety Razor, Benny’s of London Luxury Shave Brush, Perfecto Deluxe Chrome Razor and Brush Stand, Shöne Stainless Steel Shaving Bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Hare

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to anyone who uses shave soap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my partner and he absolutely loved it. We travel a lot and this is perfect for him. The lid stays on and protects the soap while we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Karmaou

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bowl, but not great for leaving in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bowl. I just wish that it were engineered better for being in a shower (mine, if left where water can land on it, will fill with water - as a result, I can't leave it in our shower, so it doesn't get as much use as it might otherwise).
customer_reviews.author: MWH

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bowl
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bowl. The chrome is shiny and flawless and it makes lathering up my shave soap much mroe enjoyable than when I was using a regular bowl out of my kitchen. Looks great with the rest of my shaving gear. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality soap cup, exquisitely designed, beautiful addition to my bath counter top. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shaving bowl. I looked long and hard for a reasonably priced antique shaving cup to no avail; I am very satisfied with this new bowl. It fits regular sized shaving soap and is shiny and elegant--an amazing quality for the price. My husband loves it, and I am very happy to have him no longer using my soap dish!
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great little dish for your soap.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Shiny polished finish with a handsome shape. Fits standard 3" x 1" soap disc and leaves plenty of room to work a nice lather up with your brush. At this price point, there are few soap dishes with lids that you can buy that looks this good. A very handsome addition to your shaving cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ercolino

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and utilitarian
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It was a hit. He switched about a year ago from drugstore shaving cream to more artisan style shaving balms, creams with a boars hair brush. The bowl he had been using was not very attractive. I would keep the previous shaving cream bowl in the drawer. He loved that the bowl was stainless and had a lid that fit snuggly on top. I liked that this bowl makes the set on the bathroom counter look far more elegant. I wont be putting this one out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: KMD1113

customer_reviews.title: Love this shaving bowl keeps my shaving cream warm
customer_reviews.text: Love this shaving bowl keeps my shaving cream warm. I let my brush soak in warm water before I shave and then pour out the warm water. I then mix a batch of shaving cream and lathers nice and warm to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Hot_Tamale!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent form, function, and value (if just a little light in terms of weight)
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an excellent shaving bowl. Having a handsome top, a beautiful chrome finish, and a wide, tapered bowl makes for exellent lathering. Not quite 5 stars as the weight is much lighter than I expected, but the form is there, the function is there, and so is the value
customer_reviews.author: R Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to take lid off
customer_reviews.text: The lid is stuck on permanently. Brand new. Couldnt get the lid off even once. I'll always have to wonder what the inside of the bowl looks like cause I'll never get to see it. Returning it after wasting a ton of time trying to open it. No idea how they get it that stuck, you would think it would function like a normal lid. Save yourself some frustration on trying to open this and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Attractive covered bowl for shave cream
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me get away with tubes of shave cream, as I am able to squeeze the entire contents into the bowl and it stays moist indefinitely with the cap on. And it looks nice enough that my wife allows me to leave it out by the sink. It will pay for itself with the reduction in the waste of shave cream.
customer_reviews.author: srhdds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Looks very nice a classic. Very tight fitting lid.
customer_reviews.author: Dobre Czasy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I bought it for soap pucks but use ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I bought it for soap pucks but use it to lather instead. The sides curving in help keep the lather in the bottom and from not working its way out the top. The lip is also well designed for dragging lather off the side of the brush. If I were to lose it, I'd buy another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shape for lathering and holding and the Lid makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly matches the other chrome shaving items. The wider base makes it perfect to hold AND perfect to melt the shaving soap in (I did the boil method). Bowl is deep enough to lather up and not create a mess everywhere with a large soap puck. ALSO, the lid makes it look nicer on the bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: GreatScott

customer_reviews.title: Shone shaving bowl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this nice looking bowl to replace a porcelain coated mug my sister gave me as a gift. The mug chipped, and I got the nastiest splinter that I could NOT dig out of my finger. So I went to Amazon to shop for a replacement and this little beauty fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: henry chinaski

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and functions well as a shaving soap cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: Right shape and size, very good quality, and affordable. I was looking for a covered bowl that I could leave by the bathroom sink that would look nice. It is made of high quality stainless steel with a tight fitting lid that complements my shaving stand, razor (Harry's), and brush. It holds the Tranquil Sandalwood All Natural Handmade Shaving Soap (see separate review) bar well.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDE D'ESTREE

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: My first straight razor shaving kit came with a ceramic mug. But I travel a lot, and the mug was heavy and took up a ton of space, plus I had to package it in a ziplock bag myself because I had no lid. Enter the Schöne Stainless Steel Shaving Bowl with Lid: the perfect answer to my predicament. By itself it's extremely lightweight, small in size yet still holds any amount of soap you'd put in a larger mug, and has a tight-fitting lid which I secure in place with a simple rubber band when it's in my luggage. So glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Torkelson

customer_reviews.title: For the man who is still old school
customer_reviews.text: yes I use mine when traveling it looks great and protects the soap well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Goad

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and looks good on my bathroom counter, give the place a little class ! I leave the soap in it and fill it with hot water while getting ready to shave then I dump the water out and load my brush up for a face lather this works really well for me and when finished I put the lid on and it keeps the soap from drying out
customer_reviews.author: Roaddog

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Just took out of the box to look at before wrapping. Decided to take off plastic cover and the lid was jammed on sideways. After getting the lid off and removing the plastic, I put the lid on and I now cannot get it open again. What a piece of junk! Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shaving bowl a few weeks ago. The lid did not fit into the rim of the bowl but I used it for my shaving soap anyway and just set the lid on top. The seller contacted me to see how I liked the product and I explained the situation with the lid not fitting. They promptly sent a replacement bowl and lid without me having to request one. 5 stars for communication, customer service, and quick response. I really like this as a daily shaving accessory. The bowl is quality stainless steel and seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl for a great shaving experience
customer_reviews.text: Great shaving bowl with a lid, which is exactly what I wanted since I'll be using it for travel. I threw my soap in it, which was much smaller than the cup, threw it in boiling water to melt the soap, then let it cool down. I was well into enjoying my shaving experience in less than 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: P. V.

customer_reviews.title: Rusting in just over 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Just over 4 months and it’s rusting and the seam is splitting open. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: theshamanswife

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with the bowl I received. Workmanship is excellent, looks great next to my razor and brush, and serves the purpose. I was a tiny bit disappointed in one regard, the bowl is much lighter than I anticipated, read it as thin. But overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl
customer_reviews.text: I bought a puck of shaving soap, melted it in a Pyrex meausurer in the microwave, and poured it into this bowl. It works great to build up a lather. I ordered this because I kept breaking ceramic shaving bowls.
customer_reviews.author: S. Christian

customer_reviews.title: If only the pieces fit
customer_reviews.text: Good weight, nicely finished. Alas, the top is just a touch too big to fit the bottom. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Trail Cook

customer_reviews.title: pleased so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Looks classy and well made. Hoping the finish lasts. This was a gift for.my son in the Air Force. I got him a whole shaving kit. Went with the SS rather than ceramic because of durability and look. Plus the lid is a nice addition. Everythi ng arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a reasonable price. Most shaving soaps I've used fit perfectly and it is shaped so that you can hold in in one hand while using a brush to generate lots of lather. More than happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaving bowl.  Strong.  Looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as described. No dings, scratches, or even smudges surprisingly. The size is the right shape for any regular shave soap. I personally put a fresh puck in, and gently warmed it over steam to melt it to the bottom of the bowl for easy loading. I'm am not sure I understand reviewers who mention it feels flimsy or it feels cheap because of its lightness. It is stainless steel. It is a very strong metal alloy. It will last for life if cared for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: best shaving product anywhere
customer_reviews.text: We have had his for a year and it still looks brand new. No rusting at all and it gets daily use. Highly recommended. It's now APril 2016 and this bowl still looks like it did the day it came out of the box. No rust - no water marks - excellent product I would buy these for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Scooch

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable and Deep.
customer_reviews.text: Received it today so can't really comment on longevity. Lighter and bigger than I expected, but it is great for the price. Looks like it may have the potential to rust. May also make a good urn or spice pincher.
customer_reviews.author: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

customer_reviews.title: really great bowl for shaving
customer_reviews.text: have used in the shower has not dented also not water stains I dry off after every use and don't let it sit in water
customer_reviews.author: Phillip sanders

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended shaving accesssory
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and attractive design. Keeps shaving soap from drying out and loosing its fragrance to the open air while looking great on the counter between shaves.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gift for my husband. He was quite surprised by the quality of the bowl. He had been looking for one with a lid but what he had found didn't compare. Love the stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Tlghamlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shaving bowl. Durable finish and it is large enough to take a 3-inch diameter puck of soap. The only difference between it and the competing Apollo is the Apollo name on the side of the bowl. They are obviously made by the same manufacturer. (I have both.) If the Apollo name is worth $5 to you, go for it. I prefer this nameless version. (It does have Schöne on the bottom.)
customer_reviews.author: Wetshaver

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We don’t travel with it because to top comes off. But my husband loves it and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Denicola

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality bowl and I was very impressed with the size. It is definitely large enough to form a nice lather to work with. It was larger than I originally anticipated. I wish the cursive letters weren't on the bottom. It is also not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jones102

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish, lid fits on bowl at the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Beautiful finish, lid fits on bowl at the perfect tightness. Big enough to hold any puck. I bought it to hold cream. It looks better than having a tube or tub out, and coordinates great with my chrome bath fixtures. Cons: Because the lid goes inside the bowl, it can get a little messy.
customer_reviews.author: Analog Kid

customer_reviews.title: ... all regular sized pucks as well as being a great receptacle for larger soaps that you need to grate ...
customer_reviews.text: Matches my shaving set fits all regular sized pucks as well as being a great receptacle for larger soaps that you need to grate or cut into smaller pieces. As long as it lasts should be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pradyumn Vij

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Shaving Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Fit/Finish was well with not problems with the lid. Really enjoyed after melting the soap into the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Cajun

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bowl.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine little covered bowl for shaving soap or whatever. The lid is very tight, almost watertight, but not quite; the steel really seems to be stainless. What it says it is, it is. What more might you want?
customer_reviews.author: dempster leech

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter steel than I was hoping for but good quality, effective and looks sharp :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but a little too big
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shave bowl but a little too big for my soap. When lathering the soap tends to sit on one side of the bowl and the lather gets down between the soap and other side. Otherwise, it looks nice and is functional. If you use a large diameter shave soap this is the perfect bowl for you.
customer_reviews.author: LunkwillAndFook

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money on a cheaper product, this is the real deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: this shaving bowl meets or exceeds all my expectations. this is not a cheaply made shaving bowl or mug. it is well designed, well constructed,and well finished. the lid fits tightly on to the bowl and holds the heat of the water well. this is a keeper!!
customer_reviews.author: bing cote-eagle

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: The items appearance is good & the lid fit to the bowl is OK. The ONLY assembly required on this item is a screw that attached the knob to the top of the lid. One of two things have happened. The screw used to attach the knob is too small or the screw has been tightened too tight & stripped the threads in the knob. Otherwise this item would have received 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great for shaving soap puck keeps it dry when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great but too large
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, but it is very big for the shape of a regular shaving soap. The result is that you have to wash it very often to avoid build-up of soap and bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and keeps everything neat and clean and my soap ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bathroom to hold soap pads. It looks great and keeps everything neat and clean and my soap pads are handy for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works great and keeps soap in place when not in used
customer_reviews.text: Works great and keeps soap in place when not in used. Over a year now and no signs of rust or discoloration. This is real stainless steel ..Great quality
customer_reviews.author: nf

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using this shaving bowl as a travel companion
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this shaving bowl as a travel companion. I would have given it a five-star rating if it had a lock mechanism. Putting it in a tight ziplock bag works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mario T. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Holds even large shaving soaps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was one of the few shaving bowls that would fit larger bars of soap. It really looks great and seems like it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent bowl at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Decent bowl at a great price. I would have given 5 stars but the bowl feels a little light/cheaply made. But at the price point you can't expect too much.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent E. Grazano

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it! Has been using it since January and we would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowl, fits well in my hand
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl, fits well in my hand, easy to clean. Because it is deep, shaving cream won't spill off while mixing it with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: P. F. Fulvio

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bowl although the carboard box it cane in was cheap. I got some white tissue paper, wrapped it in it then put it in another nicer box. Other than that it was a great buy and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cerevita

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the expensive price
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced for what you get. Metal is very thin and bowl is extremely light weight. Not as impressed as I thought I'd be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's a perfect size and it looks good in the bathroom next to the stand that holds my badger shaving brush & razor
customer_reviews.author: JetsYankees1971

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful addition to my shaving accessories. It is a fantastic soap tin. Its light in weight, but very well made. This piece will probably last a very long time so i look forward to passing it down the line.
customer_reviews.author: vlc

customer_reviews.title: Old School Shaving
customer_reviews.text: I bowl works great and gives me a touch of class to my shave. I know it will last for many, many years. Gary from Norco, CA
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great...
customer_reviews.text: This bowl looks nice but the knob on the lid keeps getting loose. Cannot be tightened as the threading is stripped. I've tried to repair with JBWeld but it doesn't last. Otherwise, it's a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eskite

customer_reviews.title: One of the best shave bowls
customer_reviews.text: I like this shave bowl because it is polished steel looks like chrome but won't flake off like chrome and it has a lid to keep the soap from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: IONer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hot soap!
customer_reviews.text: It really holds the heat. I run my brush under hot water and hold the bowl tight in my hand. There's nothing better than hot soap on your face! I've used other kinds of bowls (wood, ceramic) and they just don't hold the heat like advertised. Boo on cold soap on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Butte

customer_reviews.title: JUST A LITTLE TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I just wish it was a little smaller, since it allows the shaving soap to 'wander' in the bowl instead of staying put. Overall though, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my husband to go with his new ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband to go with his new shaving brush for his birthday last year. It has held up well and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: mysterywriter6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good looken good quality and works exactly how I wanted to
customer_reviews.author: Dany Ordonez

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice And Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Diameter large enough to accommodate big shaving soap cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Luggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shaving bowl! I have been using it for two years and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Dietel

customer_reviews.title: It's a bowl
customer_reviews.text: It's a bowl and it does a good job at holding shaving soap. It has not tried to attack me yet. Thus, I give it a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift for my son. He has ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son. He has shaving cream in a separate container and transfers to this one to make a lather. Shape works well for circling the brush around the bowl and lid preserves any left over for next day.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: The cover does not fit the bowl as-is. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover does not fit the bowl as-is. The inside lip on the cover is too big. Seeing as it's thin-ish metal, I should be able to bend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match For Serious Shaving... GOOD STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality; received very quickly and, what can you say, GREAT COMPLIMENT TO A GREAT SHAVE! LOVE IT! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fields

customer_reviews.title: This shaving bowl fits my grasp perfectly. Have already ...
customer_reviews.text: This shaving bowl fits my grasp perfectly. Have already whipped up a rich lather from both a cream purchased from Art of Shaving and a soap purchased from Walgreens. The lid helps keep the lather while I'm concentrating on my first pass shaving. Sehr schoen, indeed. Thank you, Schone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily, no rust, easy to keep clean. can hold two containers of Cella easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kstorm

customer_reviews.title: Very good shaving bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality stainless steel shaving bowl. Bright polished finish looks ice with my chrome stand and razor. Fit and finish very good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: Schöne Stainless Steel Shaving Bowl with Lid - Satisfaction Guarnteed Designed in Austria
product_meta.description:
The Schöne stainless steel is the perfect bowl and gift. This is a great item for the wet-shaving enthusiast, or can be used for many other purposes. The bowl's is beautifully polished stainless surface inside and out. It is very strong and durable and will be easy to keep clean.

This bowl is NOT chrome plated like some competitors, so the finish will not peel, flake, or easily become discolored. Simply wipe or dry the bowl after use and it will retain it's polished finish. The bowl size is for standard 3 inch shaving soaps. It will keep the soap from drying out between uses. Stainless Steel for Durability and Easy Clean Up Attractive Polished Finish will Dress Up any Shaving Set Perfect Size for Popular Shaving Soaps 3.5 Inches at the Top and Almost 4 Inches at the Bottom 2.25 Inches Deep. 

Buy the Original Schöne bowl! Excellent gift for a wet shaving man! Perfect fathers day gift!
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL: Attractive Design, Stainless Steel Shaving Bowl with Lid - The ORIGINAL Schöne Bowl
Holds All Brands of Your Favorite Shaving Soap SATISFACTION GUARANTEED!
STAINLESS STEEL: for Durability and Easy Clean Up Attractive Polished Stainless Steel Finish
Perfect Size for Popular Shaving Soaps 3.5 Inches at the Top and Almost 4 Inches at the Bottom 2.25 Inches Deep
Great gift! Perfect For Birthdays, Fathers day, Valentines day, boyfriends, dads or brothers!
